```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r readindata}
becker09 <- read.csv(paste0(system.file('raw_data', package = 'corrMeta'), '/Becker09.csv'))
```

```{r convert_data}
library(corrMeta)
becker09_list <- df_to_corr(becker09, 
                            variables = c('Cognitive_Performance', 'Somatic_Performance',
                                   'Selfconfidence_Performance', 'Cognitive_Somatic',
                                   'Cognitive_Selfconfidence', 'Somatic_Selfconfidence'))
```

## Calculate OS
```{r os}
olkin_siotani(becker09_list[[1]])
```
